text: @realDonaldTrump I love Twitter as I can easily respond to a carny President’s politically expedient posts. 108,000 Americans dead due  to Covid-19 and 40 mil unemployed. Remember your self-serving Learning Annex visits years ago? You were an insufferably incompetent empty suit even then.
